trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>classe quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor da propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives a parameter of type DrawToolTipEventArgs.
trans-unit.target: O processador para este evento recebe um parâmetro do tipo DrawToolTipEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToolTipEventArgs class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DrawToolTipEventArgs contém todas as informações necessárias para pintura o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>texto, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto no qual deve ser feito o desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar o aspeto da descrição, utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para determinar os limites da descrição e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto para efetuar o desenho personalizado.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>antes de ser apresentado pelo processamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: DrawToolTipEventArgs also supports partial customization through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: DrawToolTipEventArgs também suporta a personalização parcial através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using these methods, you can owner draw portions of the ToolTip while leaving the other portions drawn in the standard way.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar estes métodos, pode partes de desenho de proprietário da descrição, mantendo as outras partes desenhadas da forma padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The DrawToolTipEventArgs constructor uses the `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` and `toolTipText` parameters to initialize their corresponding, similarly named properties.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DrawToolTipEventArgs utiliza o `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` e `toolTipText` parâmetros ao inicializar a respetiva correspondente com o nome da mesma forma propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` and `foreColor` parameters are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O `backColor` e `foreColor` parâmetros são utilizados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>métodos, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> context used to draw the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> contexto utilizado para desenhar a descrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that the ToolTip is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref> que está vinculada a descrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that the ToolTip is being created for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que está a ser criada a descrição para.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that outlines the area where the ToolTip is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que descreve a área de onde a descrição está a ser apresentada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the text for the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o texto de descrição.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the ToolTip background.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do fundo descrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do texto de descrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar o texto da descrição.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controlo para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> can be associated with multiple controls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, the AssociatedControl property can be used to determine which control the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>pode ser associado a vários controlos através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, AssociatedControl propriedade pode ser utilizada para determinar que controlam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw>evento está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação é útil se pretender efetuar a personalização de descrição diferentes com base no controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The return value will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the ToolTip is not associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno será <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a descrição não estiver associada um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the window to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a janela para o qual este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> está vinculado.

trans-unit.source: When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma janela pertence a outra janela, a janela de propriedade é minimizada e fechada com a janela de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: Windows pertencentes à empresa também nunca são apresentados por trás do respetivo formulário de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Here the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window represented by the AssociatedWindow property.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a descrição é propriedade da janela de Win32 nativa representada pela propriedade AssociatedWindow.

trans-unit.source: The window which owns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A janela de que possui o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e a localização do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: By default, the bounds are set by the operating system based on system settings and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, os limites são definidos pelo sistema operativo com base nas definições de sistema e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>antes de ser apresentado ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>evento da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system background color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> utilizando a cor de fundo do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip background drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando pretender personalizar determinados aspetos do visual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, mas pretende um fundo de descrição padrão desenhado para utilizar o valor atual do <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O fundo é desenhado para preencher a área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the border of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system border color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha limite do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> utilizando a cor do limite de sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip border drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando pretender personalizar determinados aspetos visual de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, mas pretende um limite de descrição padrão desenhado para utilizar o valor atual do <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The border is drawn to the size specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O limite é desenhado para o tamanho especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>antes de ser apresentado pelo processamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system text color and font.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> utilizando a cor do texto de sistema e o tipo de letra.

trans-unit.source: The DrawText method represents the default method of displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O método DrawText representa o método predefinido de apresentar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Este método utiliza o tipo de letra especificado do sistema e o valor atual da <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para a cor do tipo de letra.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn as a single line centered horizontally and vertically within the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property; it is equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>: `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)`
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado como uma única linha centrada horizontal e verticalmente dentro do retângulo especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade; é equivalente à seguinte chamada para a versão do sobrecarregado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>: `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)` </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> using the system text color and font, and the specified text layout.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> utilizando a cor do texto de sistema e o tipo de letra e o esquema de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The DrawText method is used to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the layout of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O método de DrawText é utilizado para personalizar determinados aspetos visual de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, incluindo o esquema do texto da descrição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Este método utiliza o tipo de letra especificado do sistema e o valor atual da <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para a cor do tipo de letra.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> containing a bitwise combination of values that specifies the display and layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> que contenha uma combinação bit a bit dos valores que especifica a apresentar e o esquema para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de letra utilizado para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Font property when you are custom drawing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> that should use the Windows default font.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de tipo de letra quando estiver personalizado desenho um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>que deve utilizar o tipo de letra do Windows predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a superfície de gráficos para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to customize the drawing of certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto para personalizar o desenho de determinados aspetos visual de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can draw your own ToolTip background by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode desenhar o seus próprios fundo descrição utilizando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any custom drawing that is done outside of the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property will not show up.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer personalizada de desenho que é feita fora do rectângulo especificado pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade não apresentará correr</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the `ToolTip.Popup` event.
trans-unit.target: Pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>antes de ser apresentado pelo processamento do `ToolTip.Popup` eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods to draw individual parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> in the standard way used by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>classe também fornece a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>métodos para desenhar partes individuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>da forma padrão utilizado pelo sistema operativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can use these methods, together with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object methods, to make some parts of your ToolTip standard, while customizing other parts.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar estes métodos, juntamente com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>métodos, para fazer com que algumas partes do seu descrição padrão, enquanto personalizava outras partes de objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> no qual desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Typically you would use the ToolTipText property to determine what the ToolTip text is when you are custom drawing your ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utilizará a propriedade ToolTipText para determinar qual o texto da descrição é quando estiver personalizado a descrição de desenho.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to customize the drawing of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para personalizar o desenho do texto da descrição.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have the ToolTip text drawn using the system specified style, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende que o texto da descrição desenhado utilizando o sistema especificado de estilo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text value comes from the value passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto provém do valor transmitido ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O texto que está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"> </xref> evento ocorre.
